enWisdom: The human being is [distinguished] by his intellect
The intellect is the messenger of the truth
The intellect is a friend that has been cut-off
A person is the friend of what he understands
The intellect is the strongest foundation
The intellect is a sharp [cutting] sword
The intellect is [like] a new attire that does not get worn out
The intellect elevates one to the lofty stations [in Paradise]
The intellect is an honourable nobility that does not wear away

Wisdom: الْعَقْلُ صَاحِبُ جَيْشِ الرَّحْمَنِ وَالْهَوَى قَائِدُ جَيْشِ الشَّيْطَانِ وَالنَّفْسُ مُتَجَاذِبَةٌ بَيْنَهُمَا فَأَيُّهُمَا غَلَبَ كَانَتْ فِي حَيِّزِهِ
enWisdom: The intellect is the leader of the army of the Most Merciful and vain desire is the chief of the army of Satan, and the soul is pulled back and forth between them, so whichever of them is victorious, it [iethe soul] is in its domain
The intellect is a praiseworthy friend

Wisdom: أَفْضَلُ حَظِّ الرَّجُلِ عَقْلُهُ إِنْ ذَلَّ أَعَزَّهُ وَإِنْ سَقَطَ رَفَعَهُ إِنْ ضَلَّ أَرْشَدَهُ وَإِنْ تَكَلَّمَ سَدَّدَهُ
enWisdom: The best portion of a person is his intellect, if he gets humiliated it restores his honour, if he falls it raises him, if he goes astray it guides him and if he talks it directs him

Wisdom: إِنَّ اللَّهَ سُبْحَانَهُ يُحِبُّ الْعَقْلَ [الْفِعْلَ‏] الْقَوِيمَ وَالْعَمَلَ الْمُسْتَقِيمَ
enWisdom: Verily Allah, the Glorified, loves the sound intellect and the upright action

Wisdom: إِنَّ أَفْضَلَ النَّاسِ عِنْدَ اللَّهِ مَنْ أَحْيَا عَقْلَهُ وَأَمَاتَ شَهْوَتَهُ وَأَتْعَبَ نَفْسَهُ لِصَلَاحِ آخِرَتِهِ
enWisdom: Verily the best person in the sight of Allah is one who enlivens his mind, kills off his lust and exerts himself for the betterment of his Hereafter

Wisdom: إِذَا أَرَادَ اللَّهُ بِعَبْدٍ خَيْراً مَنَحَهُ عَقْلًا قَوِيماً وَعَمَلًا مُسْتَقِيماً
enWisdom: When Allah wishes good for a servant, He grants him a sound intellect and upright action
The purification of a man is through his intellect
The distinction of a man is his intellect and his magnanimity is [by] his [good] character

Wisdom: صَدِيقُ كُلِّ امْرِئٍ عَقْلُهُ وَعَدُوُّهُ جَهْلُهُ
enWisdom: The friend of every person is his intellect and his enemy is his ignorance

Wisdom: عَدَاوَةُ الْعَاقِلِ خَيْرٌ مِنْ صَدَاقَةِ الْجَاهِلِ
enWisdom: The enmity of an intelligent person is better than the friendship of an ignorant one
The highest distinction of a person is the excellence of his intellect
Religion is not reformed except by the intellect
One’s religiousness is proportionate to his intellect
The value of every person [gauged by] is what he knows

Wisdom: كُلُّ الْحَسَبِ مُتَنَاهٍ إِلَّا الْعَقْلَ وَالْأَدَبَ
enWisdom: Every distinction is limited except intelligence and good etiquette
The perfection of a human being is his intellect

Wisdom: لِكُلِّ شَيْ‏ءٍ غَايَةٌ وَغَايَةُ الْمَرْءِ عَقْلُهُ
enWisdom: Everything has a pinnacle, and the pinnacle of a person is his intellect
A believer has not [truly] believed until he comprehends
The basis of [the rightness of] an affair is the intellect

Wisdom: مَا اسْتَوْدَعَ اللَّهُ سُبْحَانَهُ امْرَأً عَقْلًا إِلَّا لِيَسْتَنْقِذَهُ بِهِ يَوْماً
enWisdom: Allah, the Glorified, has only entrusted man with an intellect so that it may one day deliver him
The distinguishing feature of a man is his intellect and his beauty is his magnanimity

Wisdom: اعْقَلْ عَقْلَكَ وَامْلِكْ أَمْرَكَ وَجَاهِدْ نَفْسَكَ وَاعْمَلْ لِلْآخِرَةِ جُهْدَكَ
enWisdom: Fetter your intellect, control your affair, struggle with your [lower] self, and exert your effort in working for the Hereafter
